android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.description: Access fine location sources, such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are and may consume additional battery power.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.description: Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (com.neulion.univisionnow.ui.activity.SplashActivity) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

manifest_analysis.title:
Broadcast Receiver (com.google.android.gms.measurement.AppMeasurementInstallReferrerReceiver) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
manifest_analysis.name: is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.[android:exported=true]

playstore_details.title: Univision App: Incluido con tu servicio de TV
playstore_details.description:
LO MEJOR DEL ENTRETENIMIENTO, NOTICIAS Y DEPORTES EN ESPAÑOL
Tendrás al alcance de la mano toda la programación las 24 horas del día para ver tus programas favoritos. Acceder a episodios completos de tu programas favoritos usando tu cuenta de cable. Puede acceder a la aplicación Univision con la mayoría de los servicios de TV, incluidos Comcast Xfinity (pronto), DirecTV, Dish, Spectrum, AT&T, Verizon FIOS y otros. Ten en cuenta que agregamos cada vez más operadores de cable. Si no encuentras el tuyo, no te desanimes; vuelve a intentar pronto.

Mira tu camino
•	Si te perdiste tus shows favoritos en Univision, Unimás y Galavisión, ahora puedes verlos on demand, un día después de su transmisión
•	Mira todos los canales de Univision ya incluidos en tu paquete de cable, incluidos Univision, UniMás, TUDN, y Galavisión. 
•	Puedes ver en vivo y on demand en casa o sobre la marcha
•	En Conecta, tus shows favoritos tienen encuestas todas las noches y premios para ti cada semana. Interactúa en vivo y participa en todas las actividades que Conecta tiene para ti.
•	Inicia una sesión con su suscripción de TV para obtener acceso a todo el catálogo de contenido on demand y en vivo.
•	Usa cualquier dispositivo, incluido el televisor o móvil, en casa, con Roku, Chromecast y Apple TV 
•	Mira programación de hasta hace tres días con la función de DVR automática.
•	 ¿No tienes servicio de televisión? Prueba una suscripción a la aplicación Univision Now. 
 
Accede a todos nuestros shows favoritos:
•	Noticiero Univision
•	Al Punto
•	Primer Impacto
•	Despierta América
•	El Gordo y la Flaca

No te pierdas ningún instante de nuestras series:
•	Enamorándonos
•	Ringo
•	Amor Eterno
•	Rosa de Guadalupe
•	Rubí

Derechos exclusivos a partidos de fútbol
•	Liga MX
•	UEFA 
•	Champions League
•	Europa League 
•	Nations League
•	Selección mexicana y estadounidense de fútbol 
•	Major League Soccer  

•	Solo está disponible en Estados Unidos (no incluye Puerto Rico) para mayores de 18 años con una suscripción, conexión de banda ancha de alta velocidad o un mínimo de 3G.
•	No toda la programación está disponible.
•	La aplicación de Univision usa software de medición de Nielsen. Para más información, visita: www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy
playstore_details.summary: The best entertainment, news and sports in Spanish from Univision
playstore_details.summaryHTML: The best entertainment, news and sports in Spanish from Univision

605 Third Avenue
14th Floor
New York, NY 10158

Accede a episodios completos de tus series y novelas favoritas usando tu cuenta de  cable. Puedes acceder al app de Univision con la mayoría de los servicios de TV.
